response.overview: As an authoritative leader embodying the fashion of the times and the spirit of the women of the time, this year's "Bazaar Fashion" in October commemorated the first new form of urban fashion film, together with Jing Boran, Ma Sichun, Yang Caiyu, Chen Feiyu, Zhang Tianai, , 8 spring and summer, and Wu Lei's current cover star perform four sets of full-textured micro-films related to "not forgetting the original heart".
response.title: Don't Forget Your Original Heart
